Casper checks back into the pod as we had dead air - bad music check to make sure anyone is out there
3 license types for a HAM

Technician Class - Entry Level License (Written Multiple Choice Test)
General Class - Adds HF privs (Written Multiple Choice Test)
Extra Class - Adds more HF privs (Written Multiple Choice Test)
